channel.title: Post-rsses on ACM CCS Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Post-rsses on ACM CCS Blog

item.title: Papers and Artifacts Available
item.description: A list of the CCS 2017 papers that are openly available is now posted. (Only a few papers now, but this will grow to hopefully include nearly all CCS 2017 papers as we reach the final paper deadline on August 29.)

item.title: Accepted Papers
item.description:
The list of papers accepted to ACM CCS 2017 is now available: Papers, Authors, Institutions

Congratulations to all our authors!

item.title: Welcome to CCS Blog
item.description: This is the Program Chair’s blog for the ACM CCS 2017 conference.
